column1: Ebola or Krokodil for rap! Basically  a problem that doesn’t exist or shit so small that it’s nothing! It’s old heads finding a way to hate new rappers!

We bury presidents  good and bad. Were you around in 1994 when Nixon’s death was on the news around the clock for several days? Don’t even compare Trump to this man. It’s like comparing apples to diarrhea.
